name: GGJ2022: Valentina in Space (1st in Tiltan site)
name_original: GGJ2022: Valentina in Space (1st in Tiltan site)
description:
1st place game in tiltan site on Global Game Jam 2022.

Each player controls either the light or the shadow, on a vertical and horizontal axis simultaneously. Together with a friend, protect Valentina from obstacles and help her reach her final destination and become the first woman to ever reach space!
